PSXProperty.name: rs_allowcloning
PSXProperty.Description: Specifies whether or not this relationship can be cloned. This property can be overridden in the request if associated locked property is not checked.

PSXProperty.name: rs_islocaldependency
PSXProperty.Description: Specifies if this relationship must be packaged and deployed with the owner. If checked, the relationship must be deployed, if not, it is optional.

PSXProperty.name: rs_skippromotion
PSXProperty.Description: Specifies if this relationship should be skipped when an item is promoted.

PSXProperty.name: rs_usedependentrevision
PSXProperty.Description: Defines whether or not to use the dependent revision as part of the dependent locator.

PSXProperty.name: rs_useownerrevision
PSXProperty.Description: Defines whether or not to use the owner revision as part of the owner locator.

PSXProperty.name: rs_useserverid
PSXProperty.Description: Specifies the user to be used while executing effects. If checked the user RXSERVER will be used, otherwise the current user will be used.

PSXProperty.name: sys_slotid
PSXProperty.Description: The slot used.

PSXProperty.name: sys_sortrank
PSXProperty.Description: The sorting rank.

PSXProperty.name: sys_variantid
PSXProperty.Description: The variant used.

PSXProperty.name: sys_folderid
PSXProperty.Description: The folder id used, optional.

PSXProperty.name: sys_siteid
PSXProperty.Description: The site id used, optional.

PSXProperty.name: rs_inlinerelationship
PSXProperty.Description: Marks a relationship as an inline link relationship. Its value is the field name and possibly the row id. If this property is missing (null or empty), the relationship is not treated as an inline link relationship.
